objectives.name: Primary Efficacy Objective - Induction
objectives.text: To evaluate the efficacy of intravenous (IV) ustekinumab in inducing clinical remission in subjects with moderately to severely active UC.

objectives.name: Primary Safety Objective - Induction
objectives.text: To evaluate the safety of IV ustekinumab in subjects with moderately to severely active UC.

objectives.name: Secondary Efficacy Objective - Endoscopic Healing (Induction)
objectives.text: To evaluate the efficacy of IV ustekinumab in inducing endoscopic healing (ie, improvement in the endoscopic appearance of the mucosa) in subjects with moderately to severely active UC.

objectives.name: Secondary Efficacy Objective - Clinical Response (Induction)
objectives.text: To evaluate the efficacy of IV ustekinumab in inducing clinical response in subjects with moderately to severely active UC.

objectives.name: Secondary Efficacy Objective - Quality of Life (Induction)
objectives.text: To evaluate the impact of IV ustekinumab on disease-specific health-related quality of life.

objectives.name: Primary Efficacy Objective - Maintenance
objectives.text: To evaluate clinical remission for SC maintenance regimens of ustekinumab in subjects with moderately to severely active UC induced into clinical response with ustekinumab.

objectives.name: Secondary Efficacy Objective - Maintenance of Clinical Response
objectives.text: To evaluate the efficacy of ustekinumab in maintaining clinical response in subjects induced into clinical response with ustekinumab.

objectives.name: Secondary Efficacy Objective - Endoscopic Healing (Maintenance)
objectives.text: To evaluate endoscopic healing (ie, improvement in the endoscopic appearance of the mucosa) in subjects induced into clinical response with ustekinumab.

objectives.name: Secondary Efficacy Objective - Corticosteroid-free Remission
objectives.text: To evaluate the efficacy of ustekinumab in achieving corticosteroid-free clinical remission in subjects induced into clinical response with ustekinumab.

objectives.name: Secondary Efficacy Objective - Maintenance of Clinical Remission
objectives.text: To evaluate the efficacy of ustekinumab in maintaining clinical remission in subjects induced into clinical remission with ustekinumab.

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective - Bristol Stool Form Scale
objectives.text: To evaluate the performance of the Bristol Stool Form Scale score in the induction study.

endpoints.name: Primary Induction Endpoint
endpoints.text: Clinical remission at Week 8

endpoints.name: Major Secondary Induction Endpoint 1
endpoints.text: Endoscopic healing at Week 8

endpoints.name: Major Secondary Induction Endpoint 2
endpoints.text: Clinical response at Week 8

endpoints.name: Major Secondary Induction Endpoint 3
endpoints.text: Change from induction baseline in the total score of the IBDQ at Week 8

endpoints.name: Primary Maintenance Endpoint
endpoints.text: Clinical remission at Week 44

endpoints.name: Major Secondary Maintenance Endpoint 1
endpoints.text: Maintenance of clinical response through Week 44

endpoints.name: Major Secondary Maintenance Endpoint 2
endpoints.text: Endoscopic healing at Week 44

endpoints.name: Major Secondary Maintenance Endpoint 3
endpoints.text: Clinical remission and not receiving concomitant corticosteroids at Week 44

endpoints.name: Major Secondary Maintenance Endpoint 4
endpoints.text: Maintenance of clinical remission through Week 44 among the subjects who had achieved clinical remission at maintenance baseline

endpoints.name: Safety Endpoints
endpoints.text: Adverse events; clinical laboratory tests (chemistry and hematology); vital signs and physical examinations; a screening electrocardiogram; allergic reactions, infusion reactions and injection site reactions; and early detection of active tuberculosis.

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint - Bristol Stool
endpoints.text: Average Bristol Stool Form Scale score over time in induction.

estimands.name: Primary Induction Efficacy Estimand (Global)
estimands.populationSummary: Adults with moderately to severely active UC (Mayo score 6-12) who failed conventional or biologic therapy Summary measure: Difference in proportions (CMH chi-square test).

intercurrentEvents.name: Treatment discontinuation
intercurrentEvents.text: Discontinuation of study agent before Week 8

intercurrentEvents.name: Rescue medication
intercurrentEvents.text: Initiation or increase in dose of UC medications (corticosteroids, 5-ASAs, immunomodulators) during induction

estimands.treatment: Ustekinumab 130 mg IV or ~6 mg/kg IV vs Placebo IV
estimands.analysisPopulation: Adults with moderately to severely active UC (Mayo score 6-12) who failed conventional or biologic therapy
estimands.variableOfInterest: Clinical remission at Week 8 (Mayo score ≤2, no subscore >1)

estimands.name: Primary Maintenance Efficacy Estimand
estimands.populationSummary: Subjects in clinical response to IV ustekinumab induction (Primary Population) Summary measure: Difference in proportions (CMH chi-square test).

intercurrentEvents.name: Clinical Flare / Loss of Response
intercurrentEvents.text: Subject meets criteria for clinical flare or loss of response before Week 44

intercurrentEvents.name: Corticosteroid use
intercurrentEvents.text: Failure to successfully taper or re-initiation of corticosteroids

estimands.treatment: Ustekinumab 90 mg SC q8w or q12w vs Placebo SC
estimands.analysisPopulation: Subjects in clinical response to IV ustekinumab induction (Primary Population)

estimands.name: Major Secondary Maintenance Estimand (Corticosteroid-free)
estimands.populationSummary: Subjects in clinical response to IV ustekinumab induction Summary measure: Difference in proportions (CMH chi-square test).
estimands.treatment: Ustekinumab 90 mg SC q8w or q12w vs Placebo SC
estimands.analysisPopulation: Subjects in clinical response to IV ustekinumab induction
estimands.variableOfInterest: Clinical remission and not receiving concomitant corticosteroids at Week 44
